title: Three-Way Tie
description: Strong knots hold love fast.  In this Neighborly Affection series short story, Henry gives his submissive lovers a day out filled with the best kind of tension.  Together for a little more than a year, Henry, Alice, and Jay have reached a comfortable equilibrium in their household of three. As they prepare for a dinner party, Henry takes their dominance games beyond the bedroom.
